casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Keith A. LEAK. No. 206A15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 23, 2015. Narendra Ghosh, Chapel Hill, for Leak, Keith A. Ebony J. Pittman, Assistant Attorney General, Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Pat Robison, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of June 2015 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of June 2015."
